short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Spread positivity and optimism with reminders, and partners.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Little Optimism is designed to enhance your mental well-being through the power of Positive Psychology Intervention. Our application focuses on a simple yet impactful practice called Daily Gratitude, known to foster resilience and contentment.

Here's how it works: Users are paired up to embark on a shared challenge, offering mutual support and encouragement along the way. Each day, participants input their grateful events from the previous week, fostering a mindset of gratitude and mindfulness.

With gentle reminders throughout the week, our extension keeps users engaged and committed to their practice, ensuring consistent progress and positive growth. Join us on this journey to cultivate resilience and elevate your mental health one grateful moment at a time.
